title: AIML - Partnerships Lead, Siri Response
summary: We are looking for a technical lead for Siri Partnerships, delivering meaningful customer impact by driving adoption of AIML research across Apple products. Past successes from this team include Personal Voice, digitally-narrated audiobooks, and Live Voicemail Transcription.
description: In this role, you will lead the charge in leveraging ground breaking AIML research to drive innovation and develop strategic partnerships that craft the future of our products. You'll work closely with cross-functional teams within Response / Siri Conversational Platform and across all partners to find opportunities, drive feature development, and deliver transformative solutions to our customers. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: - Lead the design and implementation of innovative products and features that leverage emerging AIML technologies to drive business impact. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify strategic partnerships and opportunities. Drive the end-to-end development process, from ideation and prototyping to deployment and iteration, ensuring alignment with business objectives and customer needs. Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning within the team. Stay abreast of industry trends and technological advancements, evaluating their potential impact on our products and guiding the team in adopting relevant technologies and best practices.
preferred_qualifications: 10+ years of overall experience with 5+ years building and leading a team of hard-working software engineers. Deep, hands-on technical expertise with the ability to identify and incubate opportunities. Leadership skills vital to build, lead, and develop a team around a unified vision. Experience developing and shipping AIML powered features and products to production. Executive level communication and presentation skills. Ability to develop positive relationships with cross functional partners.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation.
